name: Supreme Court (Number of Judges) Act, 1956
1: 1. Short title.-This act may be called the Supreme Court (Number of Judges) Act, 1956.
2: 2. Maximum number of Supreme Court Judges other than Chief Justice.-The maximum number of Judges of the Supreme Court, excluding the Chief Justice of India, shall be 1[thirty].1. Subs. by Act 11 of 2009, s. 2, for “twenty-five” (w.e.f. 5-2-2009).
